name: Arcane (itch) (Pika_Lorie)
description:
In a world ruled by mages who each received the favor of an element, the mysterious disappearance of one of them upsets the magical balance and plunges the world into chaos. Two mages decide to raise you in order to replace him. 

     When the time comes, they send you to recover the power of the Plants, which they have hidden. For this, each one gives you a part of his power.

     During your adventure, disturbing memories will surface. At the end of your adventure, you will have to make a choice that will influence your story.

Will you choose forgiveness or revenge?
